## Notes

-  cf janitor::clean_names for column names 
-  to use hyphens instead of underscores just use sep_out 
-  snakecase::to_snake_case("Help Me OutHere", sep_out = "-") 




## Example

```{r}
judges100_appts |> 
  mutate(court_name = snakecase::to_snake_case(court_name)) |> 
  relocate(court_name) 

```
